about_the_game:
You are one of up to 12 players forced to participate in Nona's deadly game. Compete in different challenges each round! Losing players are subjected to a vote out that will determine who gets eliminated. Negotiate your way out of elimination through text or proximity voice chat. The last surviving player wins the game!



  • Participants are grouped into 2 separate teams for the first few rounds.
  • The two teams compete with each other through various minigame challenges. The losing team will have to vote one member out.
  • If your team is forced to a vote, prepare to weasel your way out of elimination through challenge contribution, secret alliances and hidden advantages!



  • The game transitions to the Solo Rounds after a few eliminations.
  • All players now compete individually with each other and only one player per round can obtain personal vote immunity.
  • There are Challenges and Shrines all over the map that may award players with various advantages such as Private Chat, Extra Votes and more!



A final challenge awaits the last three remaining players of the game. There can only be one final winner.

The Players



Civilian
Most players will be assigned the Civilian role. They have no special skills but start with extra Energy.

Assassin
An Assassin can instantly Kill another player. This is a costly skill that requires storing a lot of Energy Points to pull off.

Spy
The Spy may place a Bug on another player, allowing them to listen from the bugged player's perspective anytime. Secretly listen to conversations of those you think may potentially be plotting your elimination.

Saboteur
The Saboteur may Sabotage another player. A sabotaged player cannot hear nor read messages of other players for an entire round.

Priest
The Priest may Bless another player. A blessed player cannot be killed and all votes on them will be disregarded. A blessing lasts for only one round.

Changeling

The Changeling is a secret role. It is disguised as an ordinary Civilian and behaves similarly. However, if it survives until only three players remain, the Final Challenge will no longer take place and the Changeling instantly wins. This provides a counterbalancing rationale to vote out Civilians. There are tools in the game to narrow down which of the Civilians may be the Changeling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x768 minimum resolution, post-2012 integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible

short_description: An online game of challenges, fragile alliances and betrayal for up to 12 players. Escape elimination through diplomacy or deceit! The last remaining player wins.
